document_data.caption: A map of Moray showing Farview on the western coast.
document_data.name: Farview
document_data.mainbody: '''Farview''' was a small village located on the isle of [[Moray]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Farview was the westernmost settlement on Moray. It was located toward the center of the island on the coast of the [[Trackless Sea]] several miles west of the southern edge of the [[Breasal Marsh]].
document_data.History: [[Northlander]] followers of the [[Storm Maiden]] liberated the village of Farview. They used timber harvested from the nearby [[Shannyth Forest]] to construct some of the finest ships seen within the Moonshae Isles. These ships were important because they allowed the Storm Maiden to move her troops among the islands of the Moonshaes, thus Farview was heavily guarded to ensure their protection.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|9}}
